long_description: Featuring training wheels and a sturdy frame, the Marin Tiny Trail 16 in. bike offers little girls the pizzazz of a big bike in a model she can handle. Tough aluminum frame is built with the same shaped tubing used on Marin adult bikes, helping it withstand the rigors of frequent use. Single-speed operation keeps the riding simple and training wheels help a young rider build confidence. Rear coaster brake is intuitively easy to engage with a simple backpedal; additional linear-pull rear brake introduces her to hand brakes. Chainguard helps keep pant legs from getting snagged or soiled by the chain. Kids' cushy saddle makes for all-day fun. Specs on the Marin Tiny Trail 16 in. bike are subject to change.
